body_html:
The failure is due to"Device type ideep not registered." when running the create_blobqueue_db_test.py just added with this check-in. The failure is not reproducible in penghui's local environment. The test seems that assume the ideep is built as part of caffe2, which may be a wrong assumption for all test build.

@wesolwsk, @PenghuiCheng, @yinghai

body:
The failure is due to"Device type ideep not registered." when running the create_blobqueue_db_test.py just added with this check-in.  The failure is not reproducible in penghui's local environment. The test seems that assume the ideep is built as part of caffe2, which may be a wrong assumption for all test build.   

@wesolwsk, @PenghuiCheng, @yinghai
